content: duo the donkey loves strolling on long windy roads to meet up with his pals after his stroll he enjoys munching on apples in the hot summer sun skill level advanced beginner the pattern is written in u s crochet terms complete with clear instructions and pictures to help you along the way duo the donkey is crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round duo the donkey is crocheted in worsted weight yarn and is approximately 6 inches tall including top of the ear be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used gauge is not particularly important just be consistent with the gauge you are using and most importantly have fun
